mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EDU_APPLY_BOARD( EDU_BOARD_NO, EDU_BOARD_TITLE, EDU_BOARD_START_PERIOD, EDU_BOARD_END_PERIOD, EDU_BOARD_APPLY_START_PERIOD, EDU_BOARD_APPLY_END_PERIOD, EDU_BOARD_APPLY_MEMBER_COUNT, EDU_APPLY_BOARD_CATEGORY, EDU_APPLY_BOARD_CONTENT ) VALUES( EDU_APPLY_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{eduBoardTitle}, #{eduBoardStartPeriod}, #{eduBoardEndPeriod}, #{eduBoardApplyStartPeriod}, #{eduBoardApplyEndPeriod}, #{eduBoardApplyMemberCount}, #{eduApplyBoardCategory}, #{eduApplyBoardContent} );
